00044 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int8Type = NULL;
00045 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int16Type = NULL;
00046 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int32Type = NULL;
00047 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int32PointerType = NULL;
00048 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int64Type = NULL;
00049 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int64PointerType = NULL;
00050 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::FloatType = NULL;

00055 const llvm::VectorType *LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType = NULL;
00056 const llvm::VectorType *LLVMTypes::Int1VectorType = NULL;
00057 const llvm::VectorType *LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType = NULL;
00058 const llvm::Type *LLVMTypes::Int32VectorPointerType = NULL;

00063 const llvm::VectorType *LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorType = NULL;
00064 const llvm::ArrayType *LLVMTypes::VoidPointerVectorType = NULL;

00066 llvm::Constant *LLVMTrue = NULL;
00067 llvm::Constant *LLVMFalse = NULL;
00068 llvm::Constant *LLVMMaskAllOn = NULL;
00069 llvm::Constant *LLVMMaskAllOff = NULL;

00072 void
00073 InitLLVMUtil(llvm::LLVMContext *ctx, Target target) {
00074     LLVMTypes::VoidType = llvm::Type::getVoidTy(*ctx);
00075     LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*ctx), 0);
00076     LLVMTypes::BoolType = llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*ctx);
00077     LLVMTypes::Int8Type = llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*ctx);
00078     LLVMTypes::Int16Type = llvm::Type::getInt16Ty(*ctx);
00079     LLVMTypes::Int32Type = llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx);
00080     LLVMTypes::Int32PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, 0);
00081     LLVMTypes::Int64Type = llvm::Type::getInt64Ty(*ctx);
00082     LLVMTypes::Int64PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64Type, 0);
00083     LLVMTypes::FloatType = llvm::Type::getFloatTy(*ctx);
00084     LLVMTypes::FloatPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatType, 0);
00085     LLVMTypes::DoubleType = llvm::Type::getDoubleTy(*ctx);
00086 
00087     // Note that both the mask and bool vectors are vector of int32s
00088     // (not i1s).  LLVM ends up generating much better SSE code with
00089     // this representation.
00090     LLVMTypes::MaskType = LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType =
00091         llvm::VectorType::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), target.vectorWidth);
00092 
00093     LLVMTypes::Int1VectorType = 
00094         llvm::VectorType::get(llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*ctx), target.vectorWidth);
00095     LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType = 
00096         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, target.vectorWidth);
00097     LLVMTypes::Int32VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType, 0);
00098     LLVMTypes::Int64VectorType = 
00099         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64Type, target.vectorWidth);
00100     LLVMTypes::Int64VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64VectorType, 0);
00101     LLVMTypes::FloatVectorType = 
00102         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatType, target.vectorWidth);
00103     LLVMTypes::FloatVectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatVectorType, 0);
00104     LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorType = 
00105         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleType, target.vectorWidth);
00106     LLVMTypes::VoidPointerVectorType = 
00107         llvm::ArrayType::get(LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType, target.vectorWidth);
00108 
00109     LLVMTrue = llvm::ConstantInt::getTrue(*ctx);
00110     LLVMFalse = llvm::ConstantInt::getFalse(*ctx);
00111 
00112     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> maskOnes;
00113     llvm::Constant *onMask = NULL;
00114     onMask = llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), -1,
00115                                     true /*signed*/); // 0xffffffff
00116 
00117     for (int i = 0; i < target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00118         maskOnes.push_back(onMask);
00119     LLVMMaskAllOn = llvm::ConstantVector::get(LLVMTypes::MaskType, maskOnes);
00120 
00121     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> maskZeros;
00122     llvm::Constant *offMask = NULL;
00123     offMask = llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), 0,
00124                                      true /*signed*/);
00125 
00126     for (int i = 0; i < target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00127         maskZeros.push_back(offMask);
00128     LLVMMaskAllOff = llvm::ConstantVector::get(LLVMTypes::MaskType, maskZeros);
00129 }

00132 llvm::ConstantInt *LLVMInt32(int32_t ival) {
00133     return llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*g->ctx), ival,
00134                                   true /*signed*/);
00135 }

00138 llvm::ConstantInt *
00139 LLVMUInt32(uint32_t ival) {
00140     return llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*g->ctx), ival,
00141                                   false /*unsigned*/);
00142 }

00146 LLVMInt64(int64_t ival) {

00148                                   true /*signed*/);

00160 LLVMFloat(float fval) {
00161     return llvm::ConstantFP::get(llvm::Type::getFloatTy(*g->ctx), fval);
00162 }

00166 LLVMDouble(double dval) {

00170 
00171 llvm::Constant *
00172 LLVMInt32Vector(int32_t ival) {
00173     llvm::Constant *v = LLVMInt32(ival);
00174     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00175     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00176         vals.push_back(v);
00177     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType, vals);
00178 }
00179

00181 llvm::Constant *
00182 LLVMInt32Vector(const int32_t *ivec) {
00183     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00184     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00185         vals.push_back(LLVMInt32(ivec[i]));
00186     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType, vals);
00187 }

00284 
00285 llvm::Constant *
00286 LLVMBoolVector(bool b) {
00287     llvm::Constant *v;
00288     if (LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType == LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType) 
00289         v = llvm::ConstantInt::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, b ? 0xffffffff : 0, 
00290                                    false /*unsigned*/);
00291     else {
00292         assert(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType->getElementType() == 
00293                llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*g->ctx));
00294         v = b ? LLVMTrue : LLVMFalse;
00295     }
00296 
00297     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00298     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00299         vals.push_back(v);
00300     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType, vals);
00301 }
00302 
00303 
00304 llvm::Constant *
00305 LLVMBoolVector(const bool *bvec) {
00306     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00307     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i) {
00308         llvm::Constant *v;
00309         if (LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType == LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType) 
00310             v = llvm::ConstantInt::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, bvec[i] ? 0xffffffff : 0, 
00311                                        false /*unsigned*/);
00312         else {
00313             assert(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType->getElementType() == 
00314                    llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*g->ctx));
00315             v = bvec[i] ? LLVMTrue : LLVMFalse;
00316         }
00317 
00318         vals.push_back(v);
00319     }
00320     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType, vals);
00321 }

00323 
00324 const llvm::ArrayType *
00325 LLVMPointerVectorType(const llvm::Type *t) {
00326     // NOTE: ArrayType, not VectorType
00327     return llvm::ArrayType::get(llvm::PointerType::get(t, 0), 
00328                                 g->target.vectorWidth);
00329 }
